sourcesContent:
import {ADD_NEW_AD} from '../actiontypes';

const DEF_STATE = {
    "year": "",
    "make": "",
    "model": "",
    "category": "",
    "user": "",
    "milage": "",
    "transmission": "",
    "fueltype": "",
    "doors": "",
    "engine": "",
    "color": "",
    "price": "",
    "image": [],
    "description":""
}

export default (state = DEF_STATE, action) => {
    switch(action.type){
        case ADD_NEW_AD: 
            return {
                year: action.year,
                make: action.make,
                model: action.model,
                category: action.category,
                user: action.user,
                milage: action.milage,
                transmission: action.transmission,
                fueltype: action.fueltype,
                doors: action.doors,
                engine: action.engine,
                color: action.color,
                price: action.price,
                image: action.image,
                description:action.description
            };
        default: 
            return state;
        
    }
}
